pullrequest.title: Model submission for X5 (Teambase) sensor configuration 1 from Sophisticated Engineering.

content.raw:
In principle that’s OK for us. Only a few questions regarding the new BaseStation.  The name Basestation is allready used in the communication model to send to the Basestation.  Due to this we named our module Teambase to have a different name. Our Teambase is communicating with the Basestation. Will there be in Cave  a new BaseStation \(acting like our Teambase\) and a Basestation for sending the artifact-report to? If yes, a different name should be used for the new BaseStation.

Will it be possible to develop own nodes for the new Basestation?
content.html:
In principle that’s OK for us. Only a few questions regarding the new BaseStation. The name Basestation is allready used in the communication model to send to the Basestation. Due to this we named our module Teambase to have a different name. Our Teambase is communicating with the Basestation. Will there be in Cave a new BaseStation (acting like our Teambase) and a Basestation for sending the artifact-report to? If yes, a different name should be used for the new BaseStation.

Will it be possible to develop own nodes for the new Basestation?
